hero.hero_title: Unlock Your Best Self—Master Your Mindset, Wealth & Relationships Today
hero.hero_description: From bankruptcy to six-figure success, I mastered the three pillars—health, power, and relationships. Now I'm here to help you turn setbacks into a springboard for extraordinary growth.
hero.hero_pitchdeck_description: I'm always launching new ventures. To explore current and upcoming opportunities, request a pitch deck below.

about.about_description: From hitting rock bottom multiple times to building six-figure success, I've mastered the art of turning setbacks into stepping stones. My mission? To help you harness your health, power, and relationships to become the best version of yourself. Let's rewrite your success story together.

services.services_description: Whether you need guidance on mindset, social media growth, finance, marketing, business building, or relationships – I cover it all.
services.service_1_moreInfo: Unlock the power of your mind. Our Mindset & Psychology service provides you with tools and strategies to overcome limiting beliefs, enhance mental resilience, and cultivate a growth mindset. Achieve clarity, focus, and emotional balance to excel in all areas of your life.
services.service_2_moreInfo: Amplify your online presence. We'll help you craft a winning social media strategy, create engaging content, and grow your audience effectively. This description is a bit longer to test how the animation handles varying text lengths and ensure smoothness.
services.service_3_moreInfo: Take control of your financial future. Learn sound investment principles, budgeting techniques, and wealth-building strategies tailored to your goals.
services.service_4_moreInfo: Boost your brand and sales. We offer expert marketing strategies, from digital campaigns to traditional outreach, to help you reach your target audience.
services.service_5_moreInfo: Turn your vision into reality. Get guidance on business planning, operational efficiency, and scaling your venture for sustainable success. Another longer description to check the animation smoothness when content varies significantly. This should push the items below down further, and the animation should remain fluid throughout the entire expansion and contraction process without any jerks or hard breaks, especially near the end of the animation sequence.
services.service_6_moreInfo: Foster deeper connections. Improve communication, build stronger bonds, and navigate relationship challenges with expert advice.
services.service_7_moreInfo: Achieve your peak physical condition. Personalized fitness plans, nutritional guidance, and motivational support to help you reach your health goals.
services.service_8_moreInfo: Maximize your OnlyFans success. Strategies for content creation, promotion, and subscriber engagement to boost your earnings.
services.service_9_moreInfo: Leverage cutting-edge technology. Explore how AI and other tech solutions can optimize your business and personal productivity.
services.service_10_moreInfo: Have other needs? Let's discuss! We offer a wide range of consulting services and can tailor solutions to your unique challenges. This is a final test case with a medium length description.
services.services_structure_1_description: Our consultations take place via video call, allowing us to connect personally. You'll be able to see me throughout the session, creating a more engaging and personal experience.
services.services_structure_2_description: Each consultation lasts a minimum of 45 minutes, ensuring we have adequate time to explore your concerns in depth and develop meaningful insights and action plans.
services.services_structure_3_description: All consultations are recorded and securely stored, giving both of us access to review the session afterward. This allows you to revisit insights and recommendations without having to take notes during our time together.
services.services_structure_4_description: After your session, you'll receive a personalized follow-up email summarizing key points and next steps, ensuring you stay on track.
services.services_structure_5_description: Book a follow-up consultation to review your progress, address new challenges, and receive continued support on your journey.

coaching.coaching_description: Personalized coaching to help you excel in specific areas of your life. Get direct access to expert guidance tailored to your unique situation and goals.
coaching.coaching_feature_1_description: Text or send audio messages anytime with questions, updates, or challenges. Get support when you need it most without waiting for scheduled appointments.
coaching.coaching_feature_2_description: Receive guidance through text, audio, or video responses based on your preference and the complexity of the topic. Visual demonstrations when needed, quick text answers when appropriate.
coaching.coaching_feature_3_description: Receive custom-tailored training sessions designed specifically for your skill level, learning style, and goals. Each class builds on your progress for maximum growth and development.
coaching.coaching_service_1_desc: Master the markets with confidence. We break down core investment principles, asset allocation, and risk-management tactics so you can build a diversified portfolio that matches your goals and risk appetite.
coaching.coaching_service_2_desc: Get a tailor-made fitness roadmap. From periodised workout plans to nutrition tweaks and habit tracking, you'll receive step-by-step guidance to hit strength, endurance, and aesthetic targets—safely and sustainably.
coaching.coaching_service_3_desc: Upgrade your dating life. Hone social-skill fundamentals, craft a magnetic online profile, and learn real-world approach frameworks that boost confidence and attract high-quality partners.
coaching.coaching_service_4_desc: Turn OnlyFans into a thriving business. We cover niche positioning, content calendars, pricing psychology, fan-funnel design, and cross-platform promotion to scale subscribers and monthly earnings.
coaching.coaching_service_5_desc: Accelerate your venture's growth. From lean business-plan audits to marketing funnels, ops systems, and KPI dashboards, you'll get actionable strategies to increase revenue and profitability.
coaching.coaching_service_6_desc: Design habits that stick. Implement science-backed routines for productivity, health, and mindset, while removing self-sabotaging behaviours through accountability loops and progress reviews.
coaching.coaching_service_7_desc: Grow an engaged audience. Receive content-pillar mapping, algorithm-proof posting schedules, analytic deep-dives, and monetisation tactics to turn followers into loyal customers.
coaching.coaching_service_8_desc: Make data-driven trades. Learn fundamental and technical research workflows, valuation models, and watch-list curation so you can spot high-conviction stock opportunities before the crowd.

projects.project_1_description: A tech startup helping businesses entering the automation age, with custom software solutions.
projects.project_2_description: A social club with real world activities and digital software to help successful people connect and achieve their dreams.

venture_investment.venture_description: I'm constantly developing new projects and ventures. If you're interested in learning more about current and upcoming opportunities, request a pitch deck below.

interviews.interviews_description: I've been featured in some of the most prestigious media outlets and big social media profiles. Here are some of my interviews and articles.
interviews.interview_1_title: The Future of AI in Business
interviews.interview_1_description: An in-depth discussion about how artificial intelligence is transforming modern business practices and what to expect in the coming years.

testimonials.testimonials_description: Here are some reviews — and if I've helped you, please leave one so we can inspire even more people.
testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: I've learned directly from Daniel for two years, moving from poverty and isolation to skill and confidence.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: Seven years following Daniel online, one year abroad learning directly—best decision of my life.

inline_chatbot.welcome_message: Welcome to DaGalow's personal assistant! I can help you with info on services, booking, or answer questions about Daniel's expertise—how can I assist you today?
inline_chatbot.booking_welcome: Your consultation has been scheduled! I'll be your pre-consultation assistant. Would you like to share what specific topics you'd like to discuss during your session?
inline_chatbot.booking_welcome_with_date: Your consultation for {{date}} ({{duration}} minutes) is confirmed! I'll be your pre-consultation assistant. Would you like to share what specific topics you'd like to discuss during your session?
inline_chatbot.coaching_welcome: Welcome to your {{tier}} coaching program! I'm your assistant and will connect you with Daniel. To make the most of your coaching experience, could you share what specific goals you're hoping to achieve?
inline_chatbot.analysis_welcome: Thank you for requesting our {{type}} analysis service! I'll be gathering some initial information to help us provide you with the most comprehensive analysis. Could you provide some specific details about what you'd like us to analyze?
inline_chatbot.pitch_deck_welcome: Thanks for your interest in the {{project}} project! I'll be gathering some information to help prepare your pitch deck. Could you tell me a bit about what attracted you to this venture and what kind of investment you're considering?

tiers.question: What coaching tiers do you offer and what's included with each?
tiers.answer:
I offer three distinct coaching tiers to meet your specific needs:

1. Weekly Plan (€40/month): I'll answer your questions once a week. You can submit as many questions as you need, and I'll address them all in a comprehensive weekly response.

2. Daily Plan (€90/month): I provide daily responses to your questions for more continuous guidance and faster progress toward your goals.

3. Priority Plan (€230/month): You'll receive answers as soon as possible with top priority handling. This premium tier ensures you're never waiting for critical advice.

right_package.question: How do I know which coaching package is right for me?
right_package.answer:
The right coaching package depends on your goals, timeline, and the level of support you need:

- Choose Weekly if you're looking for guidance on a longer-term project or goal with a flexible timeline.
- Choose Daily if you need regular accountability and feedback to maintain momentum.
- Choose Priority if you're making time-sensitive decisions or navigating a critical phase that requires immediate expert input.

Your choice should reflect what coaching area you're seeking help with, whether it's financial guidance, personal training, relationship advice, or any other specialized area.

change_subscription.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my coaching package?
change_subscription.answer: Yes, you can change your subscription tier whenever you want. If your needs change or you discover you need more or less support, simply update your subscription in your account settings. Changes will take effect at your next billing cycle.

communication.question: What communication channels do you use for coaching?
communication.answer: All coaching communication takes place via WhatsApp for seamless, convenient interaction. This allows for easy sharing of text, images, voice messages, and documents while maintaining a single, organized thread of our conversations.

booking.question: How do I book a consultation?
booking.answer:
Booking a consultation is straightforward:
1. Select your preferred date on my calendar
2. Choose a duration that fits your needs (45–120 minutes)
3. Select a time slot from available hours
4. Complete your contact information
5. Process your payment securely through Stripe
6. Receive confirmation and meeting details

preparation.question: What should I prepare before our consultation?
preparation.answer: To make the most of our time together, I recommend using the chatbot step in the booking process to provide key information about your situation. This helps me organize your session efficiently, ensuring we maximize your time and investment.

reschedule.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
reschedule.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment if your plans change. Simply log into your account and adjust your booking, or contact me directly.

advance_booking.question: How far in advance should I book a consultation?
advance_booking.answer: I recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance to secure your preferred time slot. For urgent matters, you may contact me directly to check for last-minute availability.

followup.question: What happens after our consultation?
followup.answer: My consultations are designed as standalone sessions without automatic follow-up. You'll receive the guidance and action steps you need during our time together. If you find you need additional support after implementing the initial advice, you're welcome to schedule another session or consider one of my ongoing coaching packages.

types.question: What types of analysis do you offer?
types.answer:
I offer three specialized analysis services:

- Stock Analysis: Comprehensive evaluation of investments including technical indicators, fundamental analysis, and potential growth trajectories.
- Company Analysis: In-depth assessment of business models, competitive positioning, financial health, and growth opportunities.
- Social Media Analysis: Detailed review of social media accounts, engagement metrics, audience demographics, and optimization strategies.

Each analysis is custom-tailored to your specific questions and objectives.

information.question: What information do I need to provide for an analysis?
information.answer:
To ensure a thorough and relevant analysis, please provide:
- The specific stock symbol, company name, or social media account you want analyzed
- Your key questions or concerns about the subject
- Any particular metrics or aspects you're most interested in understanding

The more specific you are about what you want to know, the more valuable your analysis will be.

delivery.question: How will analysis results be delivered?
delivery.answer: You'll receive a comprehensive PDF report via email containing all findings, insights, and recommendations. This document includes visual elements such as graphs, charts, and comparative tables where applicable.

offering.question: What are the pitch decks you offer?
offering.answer: I provide access to my personal pitch decks for companies I'm currently building. These are real-world examples of successful pitches that have attracted investor interest. Available pitch decks include: Perspectiv, Galow.Club, Pizzaria.

purpose.question: Why should I use the chatbot before my service?
purpose.answer: The chatbot is an essential final step in our service process that helps you maximize the value of your investment. By sharing specific information about yourself, your situation, and your goals through the chatbot, you allow me to prepare thoroughly before our interaction begins. This preparation means we can use 100% of our paid time together focusing on solutions rather than gathering basic information. Clients who use the chatbot report significantly more productive sessions and better outcomes, as we can dive straight into the core discussion.

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. I accept all major credit and debit cards. Coaching subscriptions are billed monthly and automatically renew until canceled. One-time services like consultations and analyses are paid at the time of booking.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: At DaGalow, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website and services.

information.title: 1. Information We Collect
information.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
items: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)
Profile information
Payment and transaction information
Communications you send to us
Usage information and interaction with our services

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Process transactions and send related information
Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions
Personalize your experience
Monitor and analyze trends and usage

sharing.title: 3. Sharing of Information
sharing.description: We may share your information with:
items: Service providers who perform services on our behalf
Payment processors
Professional advisors
When required by law or to protect rights

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have rights to:
items: Access personal data we hold about you
Request correction of your personal data
Request deletion of your personal data
Object to processing of your personal data
Request restriction of processing your personal data
Request transfer of your personal data
Withdraw consent

contact.title: 5. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@dagalow.com

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ('Terms') carefully before using the DaGalow website and services operated by DaGalow ('we,' 'us,' or 'our').

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

accounts.title: 2. User Accounts
accounts.description: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

payments.title: 3. Payments and Subscriptions
items: You agree to pay all fees or charges to your account based on the fees, charges, and billing terms in effect at the time a fee or charge is due and payable.
You must provide a valid payment method for paying all fees.
Subscriptions will automatically renew until cancelled.
Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period.

coaching.title: 4. Coaching Services
coaching.description: Our coaching services are provided for informational and educational purposes only. We do not guarantee specific results. Implementation of advice and recommendations is at your own risk and discretion.

property.title: 5. Intellectual Property
property.description: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DaGalow. Our service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.description: In no event shall DaGalow, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for changes.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at terms@dagalow.com

account.benefit2: Access your appointment history and saved chatbot conversations.

chatbot.title: Smart Assistance: Our AI Chatbot
chatbot.description: Our AI assistant helps you find the right services and prepares us for your consultations, saving you time and money.
chatbot.benefit1: Guides you to the best service for your needs.
chatbot.benefit2: Gathers key info before sessions for a focused consultation.
chatbot.benefit3: Provides instant answers about our services.
